org.sindice.siren.solr.qparser.keyword

Class KeywordQParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.solr.search.QParser
      • org.sindice.siren.solr.qparser.SirenQParser
        • org.sindice.siren.solr.qparser.keyword.KeywordQParser

  • public class KeywordQParser
extends SirenQParser
    Implementation of SirenQParser for the KeywordQueryParser.

    The KeywordQParser is in charge of parsing a SIREn's keyword query request.
